title: Period Calculator | Predict Next Period, Ovulation, and Fertile Window

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: 1) Next period start: D_next = D_LMP + CL 2) Period window: [D_next, D_next + (PL - 1)] 3) Ovulation (estimate): O = D_next - 14 4) Fertile window: [O - 5, O + 1] 5) With cycle variation ±v: D_next ∈ [D_LMP + (CL - v), D_LMP + (CL + v)]
